AT.name: Fallblox™
AT.description: Willkommen in der Welt von „Fallblox“! Bereite dich darauf vor, deine grauen Zellen mit 140 neuen Leveln und 90 Übungen an ihre Grenzen zu bringen – denn in dieser kniffligen Spielwelt erwartet dich eine einzigartige Ergänzung: die Schwerkraft! Wenn du den Vorgänger „Pullblox“ kennst, sieht „Fallblox“ möglicherweise vertraut aus – aber lass dich nicht täuschen: Dank neuer Elemente bietet „Fallblox“ eine völlig neue Erfahrung mit jeder Menge Grübelpotenzial! Wie schon bei „Pullblox“ besteht das Ziel der einzelnen Level darin, die Spitze des Gebildes zu erreichen. Aber wo Mallo sich zuvor um Kinder kümmerte, muss er jetzt die bunten Vögel retten, die an der Spitze der einzelnen Level gefangen sind. Und während die bunten Blöcke in „Pullblox“ nur nach außen und innen gezogen bzw. geschoben werden konnten, gibt es bei „Fallblox“ noch eine dritte Dimension – und ein völlig neues Ausmaß des Rätselerlebnisses!

AU.name: Fallblox™
AU.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! Fallblox might look familiar if you’ve already played its predecessor, Pullblox, but don’t be fooled! New gameplay elements help make Fallblox a totally new experience and one that’ll have you scratching your head for a long time to come! As in Pullblox, the objective of each level is to reach the top of the structure – where he previously rescued children, Mallo now has to save the colourful birds that are trapped at the top of each stage. But while the coloured blocks of Pullblox could only be pulled outwards or pushed inwards, Fallblox adds a third dimension and a whole new layer of challenge to the puzzle experience!

BG.name: Fallblox™
BG.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! Fallblox might look familiar if you’ve already played its predecessor, Pullblox, but don’t be fooled! New gameplay elements help make Fallblox a totally new experience and one that’ll have you scratching your head for a long time to come! As in Pullblox, the objective of each level is to reach the top of the structure – where he previously rescued children, Mallo now has to save the colourful birds that are trapped at the top of each stage. But while the coloured blocks of Pullblox could only be pulled outwards or pushed inwards, Fallblox adds a third dimension and a whole new layer of challenge to the puzzle experience!

BE.name: Fallblox™
BE.description: Bienvenue dans l'univers de Fallblox ! Préparez-vous à utiliser votre cerveau au maximum de ses capacités avec 140 niveaux inédits, 90 exercices et un nouvel élément à prendre en compte dans ce jeu de casse-tête : la gravité ! Fallblox vous semblera peut-être familier si vous avez déjà joué à son prédécesseur, Pullblox, mais ne vous y trompez pas ! De nouveaux éléments de jeu en font une expérience totalement inédite, sur laquelle vous pourrez vous remuer les méninges pendant un bon moment ! Comme dans Pullblox, l'objectif de chaque niveau consiste à atteindre le sommet de la structure. Alors qu'il devait précédemment sauver des enfants, Millo doit cette fois aider les oiseaux colorés coincés tout en haut de chaque niveau. Mais là où les blocs colorés de Pullblox ne pouvaient être que tirés vers l'extérieur ou poussés vers l'intérieur, Fallblox ajoute une troisième dimension et une difficulté supplémentaire à ce jeu de casse-tête !

ES.name: Fallblox™
ES.description: ¡Bienvenido al mundo de Fallblox! ¡Prepárate para llevar tu mente al límite con 140 nuevos niveles, 90 prácticas y un nuevo elemento de juego: la gravedad! Si ya has jugado al predecesor de Fallblox, Pullblox, puede que su aspecto te resulte familiar, ¡pero no te engañes! ¡Nuevos elementos en el juego hacen de Fallblox una experiencia completamente nueva, y mantendrán tus neuronas ocupadas durante largo tiempo! Al igual que en Pullblox, el objetivo de cada nivel es alcanzar la cima de la estructura. Donde Millo tenía que rescatar niños en el anterior juego, ahora debe salvar a los coloridos pájaros atrapados en la cima. Sin embargo, mientras que en Pullblox los bloques de colores solo se podían sacar hacia fuera o empujar hacia dentro, en Fallblox se añade una tercera dimensión y con ella un nuevo reto en la resolución de los puzles.

FI.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! IT.name: Fallblox™
IT.description: Benvenuto nel mondo di Fallblox! Preparati a spremere al massimo le tue meningi con 140 nuovi livelli, 90 esercizi e un'eccezionale aggiunta alla meccanica di gioco: la gravità! Se hai già giocato a Pullblox, il gioco che ha preceduto Fallblox, a prima vista questo nuovo titolo ti sembrerà piuttosto familiare. Ma non lasciarti ingannare dalle apparenze! I nuovi elementi del gameplay fanno di Fallblox un'esperienza completamente nuova che terrà impegnate a lungo le tue cellule grigie! Come in Pullblox, lo scopo di ogni livello è raggiungere il vertice della struttura. Se prima Mallo doveva salvare i bambini, ora deve salvare gli uccelli colorati che sono intrappolati in cima ad ogni livello. Ma mentre i blocchi colorati di Pullblox potevano solo essere tirati per estrarli o spinti verso l'interno, Fallblox aggiunge all'esperienza del puzzle una terza dimensione e una sfida tutta nuova!

NL.name: Fallblox™
NL.description: Welkom in de wereld van Fallblox! Laat je hersenen kraken met 140 nieuwe levels, 90 trainingsoefeningen en een unieke toevoeging aan de blokkenpuzzels: zwaartekracht! Als je voorganger Pullblox hebt gespeeld, ziet Fallblox er misschien bekend uit, maar vergis je niet! Nieuwe spelelementen maken van Fallblox een compleet nieuwe ervaring, eentje die je nog lang aan het puzzelen houdt! Net als bij Pullblox is het in elk level de bedoeling om de top van de blokken te bereiken. In de voorganger moest Mallo kinderen redden, dit keer zitten kleurrijke vogels op de top van elke stapel gevangen. Maar terwijl je de blokken van Pullblox alleen naar voren kon trekken of naar achteren kon duwen, voegt Fallblox een derde dimensie toe om een heel nieuwe draai aan de puzzelpret te geven!

NZ.name: Fallblox™
NZ.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! Fallblox might look familiar if you’ve already played its predecessor, Pullblox, but don’t be fooled! New gameplay elements help make Fallblox a totally new experience and one that’ll have you scratching your head for a long time to come! As in Pullblox, the objective of each level is to reach the top of the structure – where he previously rescued children, Mallo now has to save the colourful birds that are trapped at the top of each stage. PL.name: Fallblox™
PL.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! PT.name: Fallblox™
PT.description: Bem-vindo ao mundo de Fallblox! Prepara-te para testar a tua matéria cinzenta com 140 níveis, 90 exercícios de treino e um novo elemento: a gravidade! Se jogaste o título anterior protagonizado por Mallo, Pullblox, Fallblox já não será desconhecido. No entanto, não percas a oportunidade de experienciar novos elementos de jogabilidade e de pores essa cabecinha a pensar com novos quebra-cabeças! Tal como em Pullblox, o objetivo de cada nível é chegar ao topo da estrutura, sendo que agora, ao invés de resgatar crianças, Mallo terá de ajudar coloridos passarinhos que estão presos no topo de cada nível. Mas ao passo que os blocos de Pullblox só podiam ser puxados para fora ou empurrados para dentro, Fallblox adiciona uma terceira dimensão e um novo grau de desafio à resolução dos puzzles.

RU.name: Fallblox™
RU.description: Добро пожаловать в мир Fallbox! Приготовьтесь как следует напрячь смекалку на 140 новых уровнях и в 90 тренировочных испытаниях. Головоломки дополнились новым уникальным аспектом: силой притяжения! Fallblox может напомнить вам своего предшественника Pullblox, но это только на первый взгляд! Новые возможности делают Fallblox совершенно новой игрой, над которой вам еще долго придется ломать голову! Как и в Pullblox, цель Mallo на каждом уровне — достигнуть вершины конструкции. Раньше он спасал там детей, а теперь ему нужно собрать там красочных птиц. Но если в Pullblox разноцветные блоки можно было только тащить наружу или толкать внутрь, в Fallblox появляется новое измерение, выводящие головоломки на совершенно новый уровень сложности.

SE.name: Fallblox™
SE.description: Welcome to the world of Fallblox! Get ready to push your brain to the limit with 140 new levels, 90 training exercises and a unique addition to the puzzling gameplay: gravity! Fallblox might look familiar if you’ve already played its predecessor, Pullblox, but don’t be fooled! New gameplay elements help make Fallblox a totally new experience and one that’ll have you scratching your head for a long time to come! As in Pullblox, the objective of each level is to reach the top of the structure – where he previously rescued children, Mallo now has to save the colourful birds that are trapped at the top of each stage. New gameplay elements help make Fallblox a totally new experience and one that’ll have you scratching your head for a long time to come! As in Pullblox, the objective of each level is to reach the top of the structure – where he previously rescued children, Mallo now has to save the colourful birds that are trapped at the top of each stage. But while the coloured blocks of Pullblox could only be pulled outwards or pushed inwards, Fallblox adds a third dimension and a whole new layer of challenge to the puzzle experience!
